definition: to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The normal value of dark adaptation of adults was within 50 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 青年人暗适应时问正常值在50秒以内。

sentences.english: The bleaching and the dark adaptation time were automatically controlled and recorded.
sentences.chinese: 强光漂白与暗适应计时自动控制。

sentences.english: The experimental results indicate the dark adaption time of drivers has great difference.
sentences.chinese: 实测结果表明驾驶员的暗适应时间有较显著的差异。

sentences.english: Dark Alex fits much more comfortably into the hacker mould.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯暗适应模具黑客入从容得多。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
